title: Playing against darius drains my life force.
body:
I can't stand him. Builds cleaver into tank and fucks you up. Even if you manage to kill him top while playing a melee champ, he can be 0/5 but in teamfights he gets his passive off, welp he's 5/5 now.
Even if you're ahead, you need multiple people to kill him, he's always such a massive threat, you need to work like a mofo just to not die, and it feels like I'm doing a chore. I hate him.
I don't understand why he needed a aoe heal, while being a bully.
This bitch too. {{champion:114}}  Those 2 idiots are the reason I'm a support main this season.

Okay clearly none of you are high elo, or darius players. 

The most effective way of neutralizing darius is shutting him down early, camping top lane and ruining his day. he is a monster when ahead, terrible when behind. 

He can be kited by many of the top lane adversaries. Kennen is cancer to lane against, poke and dont get in range of grab. if he doesnt get kills, he won't be nearly as impactful in a game.
Renekton can dive in, poke stun and dive out, decent matchup. 
Fiora generally beats darius if u can parry ult or grab.
Rivens can outplay a darius, but darius base damage makes it difficult if youre not very good at the champ

Mid-late game is pretty obvious. Aim the darius in teamfight or catch him splitting. Your adc can poke home from a distance and theres nothing he can do without flash engaging. The mage can poke him as well..

Basically the key thing though, is not to let the darius get a big lead. He can snowball like a fiora.
So the best way to counter darius is to olay ranged top laner aka the counter to 99% of top lane roster? Nice1

What? i gave 1 ranged top laner.

Fiora, Renekton, Riven can all beat darius. Jayce also can destroy darius.

The only one at top lane that bothers me is {{champion:23}}, He forces his play-style onto you whether you like it or not, His a force to be reckoned with and you are going to stay at the lane his pushing opposing his usefulness while feeling lonely and away from your teammates. T-T

I main Renekton and Irelia. With Renekton it's pretty easy to beat Darius. With Irelia I can beat him, but it's definitely a more interesting lane. A lot of using my Q to dodge his Q. Don't mind seeing him in lane, but there are times I wish he didn't do so much damage by building straight tank and getting multiple Q's off in team-fights. Makes his mid-late game pretty abusive even when he lost lane hard.

Don't mind the typical darius, just respect his power spikes even if you're ahead (as you should with most fighters including Fiora).  

That said, Darius running ignite and flash is pure frustration.  Level 2, I'm full hp, and he gets of an AA, AA, Q, Ignite and I'm dead 4 seconds later despite chugging potions.

wanna know how to fight darius as a person that mains him and can win as GAREN vs darius??

let him push in lane like he has no escape and flash might not be enough

also dont let him get free autos, so many times i auto, q before the tick leaves and simply engage like taadaaa free kill

That's kinda an interesting combo of champions to hate. 
One is immobile, punishes you for fighting them early, thrives in long trades/all ins, and is relatively simple/binary. 
The other is mobile, bursty in lane, complicated and has to out play you, and scales late.
Trade him until he is at 50%hp without damage yourself then burst him out with Pantheon.
Darius playstyle is far too toxic to deal with so is Fiora's
